snippet: The reasons for the moves against the lawyers remained unclear, but several lawyers and activists suspected an effort to crush China’s “rights defense” movement.
abstract: Chinese police detain prominent human rights lawyer Li Heping, as three other lawyers who worked together disappear in Beijing; moves appear to be another move by Communist Party to stop China human rights defense movement in China.
lead_paragraph: The reasons for the moves against the lawyers remained unclear, but several lawyers and activists suspected an effort to crush China’s “rights defense” movement.

headline.main: Chinese Authorities Appear to Detain 4 Human Rights Lawyers
headline.print_headline: China Holds a Rights Lawyer as 3 Others Disappear

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
